Follow me, let's install linux into your computer and run it.

*windows*

1. Download the lasted Win32 installer to your computer.
2. Run the installer.
3. Click menu "Start->Programs->Lysee 0.1.9->Lysee Interpreter" to start Lysee. 

*Linux*

1. Download source code to your computer.
2. Unizp it.
3. Copy libc package of Free Pascal to your home place.
4. Change current position to _LYSEE_FOLDER/lysee_.
5. Compile lysee with: make.
6. Install lysee with: sudo make install.
7. Lysee will be installed to _/usr/local/lib/lysee_.
8. Soft link _/usr/bin/lysee_ will be created.
8. Type "lysee" and return will start lysee.
